item.description:
Hi folks--

There was some confusion about the Panera Bread location. I'm hosting this Meetup at my house. If someone wants to plan something at Panera, that's fine. It's just not in my neck of the woods.

I have Monopoly, Scrabble and a bunch of kids games/cards. Bring along what you would like.

 

See you soon!

 

Verena
item.why: We all like to play games, socialize and have fun!!

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Game Night
